comment: Nazis were not anti Christian. Nazis were not anti Pagan. Nazis were not anti Vlkisch. Stop infighting. We must unite against our foe.

# ::snt Nazis were not anti Christian. Nazis were not anti Pagan. Nazis were not anti Vlkisch. Stop infighting. We must unite against our foe.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (o / oppose-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :mod (p2 / political-party
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Nazi")))
            :ARG1 (r / religious-group
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Christian")))
      :snt2 (o2 / oppose-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :mod (p4 / political-party
                        :name (n3 / name
                              :op1 "Nazism")))
            :ARG1 (p5 / person
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Pagan")))
      :snt3 (s / stop-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (ii / infight-05
                  :ARG1 (w / we)
                  :prep-against (p6 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 w
                              :ARG2 (f / foe)))))
      :snt4 (o3 / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (u / unite-01
                  :ARG1 w
                  :prep-against f
                  :poss w)))
